The Aesthetics Beauté

The Ordinary - Glycolic Acid 7%

I'm using this tonic in a different way. I'm trying to improve my back skin, since I have some scars from acne.

In my first week, I felt a little burning, but now I don't feel nothing.

After 4 weeks, I already feel the diference in the texture. The glycolic acid sloughs away the dead skin and I don't feel any bumps or texture anymore.

I still have the black spots, lets wait a little more to have an opinion about the lightening
